name: NPR
text:
An NPR report revealed the Trump administration awarded over $6 billion in vaccine contracts through a third party. Government contracts executed this way aren't required to include taxpayer protections. 

Now, it faces calls to disclose those contracts. https://t.co/FHEOk5iPSE

name: NPR
text: As politicians prepare for the possibility of a contested election, Gen. Mark Milley, the chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, says the military "will obey the lawful orders of civilian control." https://t.co/RMTGMWMznP
